TopicTitle: KSP Enhanced Edition Xbox Series X Drag Overlay

Articles.Content:
Just was curious about drag factors on enhanced Xbox version.

I used to play on computer but currently playing on Xbox and don't see the drag overlay option anywhere.

I'm assuming the function never made it to Xbox I still have some questions.

Stowed items in cargo bays that are fully closed and capped at both ends produce no drag as long as they're not poking out, correct?

If true, does this apply to the Mk2 Clamp-O-Tron as well?

I've built an SSTO and was just trying to squeeze extra fuel into the docking bay with some lights.

Just unsure if doing this is actually beneficial or reduces drag, or if I should just add longer tanks on the engine nacelles?

Idk why they don't have drag factors on parts for Xbox like computer version or the drag overlay during flight, I think it's a very useful tool.
